mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.zpjhmc AS "zpjhmc", a.zpjhid AS "zpjhid", a.zpxqid AS "zpxqid", a.username AS "username", a.password AS "password", a.userlx AS "userlx", a.gh AS "gh", a.nl AS "nl", a.namepy AS "namepy", a.namecym AS "namecym", a.ssbm AS "ssbm", a.ssbmid AS "ssbmid", a.rpzhiwei AS "rpzhiwei", a.rpzhiweiid AS "rpzhiweiid", a.xb AS "xb", a.csrq AS "csrq", a.csd AS "csd", a.gj AS "gj", a.jg AS "jg", a.mz AS "mz", a.sfzlx AS "sfzlx", a.sfzhm AS "sfzhm", a.hjlx AS "hjlx", a.hjdz AS "hjdz", a.gatjw AS "gatjw", a.zzmm AS "zzmm", a.rdsj AS "rdsj", a.zjxy AS "zjxy", a.mzdp AS "mzdp", a.hyzk AS "hyzk", a.xx AS "xx", a.sg AS "sg", a.tz AS "tz", a.zp AS "zp", a.jkzk AS "jkzk", a.cjgzsj AS "cjgzsj", a.cjsj AS "cjsj", a.bzlx AS "bzlx", a.gwlx AS "gwlx", a.zw AS "zw", a.zc AS "zc", a.gwdj AS "gwdj", a.yjsds AS "yjsds", a.zyzg AS "zyzg", a.zyzgsj AS "zyzgsj", a.ryzt AS "ryzt", a.zgxlxw AS "zgxlxw", a.dyxlxw AS "dyxlxw", a.zgxlxx AS "zgxlxx", a.dyxlxx AS "dyxlxx", a.zgxlrxsj AS "zgxlrxsj", a.zgxlbysj AS "zgxlbysj", a.dyxlrxsj AS "dyxlrxsj", a.dyxlbysj AS "dyxlbysj", a.sxzy AS "sxzy", a.dyzy AS "dyzy", a.xueke AS "xueke", a.dy211 AS "dy211", a.zg211 AS "zg211", a.dywy AS "dywy", a.wyslcd AS "wyslcd", a.pthsp AS "pthsp", a.bgdh AS "bgdh", a.sj AS "sj", a.qq AS "qq", a.yx AS "yx", a.bgdz AS "bgdz", a.jtzz AS "jtzz", a.txdz AS "txdz", a.youbian AS "youbian", a.rsdadw AS "rsdadw", a.rsdabh AS "rsdabh", a.tc AS "tc", a.jianli AS "jianli", a.chengji AS "chengji", a.bishi AS "bishi", a.mianshi AS "mianshi", a.khzf AS "khzf", a.yxbz AS "yxbz", a.xcqrbz AS "xcqrbz", a.zgsc AS "zgsc", a.dqsxren AS "dqsxren", a.dqsxrenid AS "dqsxrenid", a.dqsxzt AS "dqsxzt", a.zzsxzt AS "zzsxzt", a.saixuanyj AS "saixuanyj", a.niluyong AS "niluyong", a.shenpi AS "shenpi", a.spren AS "spren", a.sprenid AS "sprenid", a.ruzhi AS "ruzhi", a.beizhu AS "beizhu", (SELECT b.name from zidian b where a.zzmm = b.id) AS "zzmmMc", (SELECT b.name from zidian b where a.dyxlxw = b.id) AS "dyxlMc", (SELECT b.name from zidian b where a.zgxlxw = b.id) AS "zgxlMc", (SELECT b.name from zidian b where a.mz = b.id) AS "mzMc", a.zyyq
inner join t_zp_zpjh b on b.id=a.zpjhid
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zpjlxq( zpjhmc, zpjhid, zpxqid, username, password, userlx, gh, namepy, namecym, ssbm, ssbmid, rpzhiwei, rpzhiweiid, xb, csrq, csd, gj, jg, mz, sfzlx, sfzhm, hjlx, hjdz, gatjw, zzmm,
rdsj,
zjxy, mzdp, hyzk, xx, sg, tz, zp, jkzk,
cjgzsj,
cjsj, bzlx, gwlx, zw, zc, gwdj, yjsds, zyzg,
zyzgsj,
ryzt, zgxlxw, dyxlxw, zgxlxx, dyxlxx,
zgxlrxsj,
zgxlbysj,
dyxlrxsj,
dyxlbysj,
sxzy, dyzy, xueke, dy211, zg211, dywy, wyslcd, pthsp, bgdh, sj, qq, yx, bgdz, jtzz, txdz, youbian, rsdadw, rsdabh, tc, jianli, chengji, bishi, mianshi, khzf, yxbz, xcqrbz, zgsc, dqsxren, dqsxrenid, dqsxzt, zzsxzt, saixuanyj, niluyong, shenpi, spren, sprenid, ruzhi,
nl,
beizhu, zyyq, create_date ) VALUES ( #{zpjhmc}, #{zpjhid}, #{zpxqid}, #{username}, #{password}, #{userlx}, #{gh}, #{namepy}, #{namecym}, #{ssbm}, #{ssbmid}, #{rpzhiwei}, #{rpzhiweiid}, #{xb}, #{csrq}, #{csd}, #{gj}, #{jg}, #{mz}, #{sfzlx}, #{sfzhm}, #{hjlx}, #{hjdz}, #{gatjw}, #{zzmm},
#{rdsj},
#{zjxy}, #{mzdp}, #{hyzk}, #{xx}, #{sg}, #{tz}, #{zp}, #{jkzk},
#{cjgzsj},
#{cjsj}, #{bzlx}, #{gwlx}, #{zw}, #{zc}, #{gwdj}, #{yjsds}, #{zyzg},
#{zyzgsj},
#{ryzt}, #{zgxlxw}, #{dyxlxw}, #{zgxlxx}, #{dyxlxx},
#{zgxlrxsj},
#{zgxlbysj},
#{dyxlrxsj},
#{dyxlbysj},
#{sxzy}, #{dyzy}, #{xueke}, #{dy211}, #{zg211}, #{dywy}, #{wyslcd}, #{pthsp}, #{bgdh}, #{sj}, #{qq}, #{yx}, #{bgdz}, #{jtzz}, #{txdz}, #{youbian}, #{rsdadw}, #{rsdabh}, #{tc}, #{jianli}, #{chengji}, #{bishi}, #{mianshi}, #{khzf}, #{yxbz}, #{xcqrbz}, #{zgsc}, #{dqsxren}, #{dqsxrenid}, #{dqsxzt}, #{zzsxzt}, #{saixuanyj}, #{niluyong}, #{shenpi}, #{spren}, #{sprenid}, #{ruzhi},
#{nl},
#{beizhu}, #{zyyq}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zpjlxq SET zpjhmc = #{zpjhmc}, zpjhid = #{zpjhid}, zpxqid = #{zpxqid}, username = #{username}, password = #{password}, userlx = #{userlx}, gh = #{gh}, namepy = #{namepy}, namecym = #{namecym}, ssbm = #{ssbm}, ssbmid = #{ssbmid}, rpzhiwei = #{rpzhiwei}, rpzhiweiid = #{rpzhiweiid}, xb = #{xb}, csrq = #{csrq}, csd = #{csd}, gj = #{gj}, jg = #{jg}, mz = #{mz}, sfzlx = #{sfzlx}, sfzhm = #{sfzhm}, hjlx = #{hjlx}, hjdz = #{hjdz}, gatjw = #{gatjw}, zzmm = #{zzmm}, rdsj = #{rdsj}, zjxy = #{zjxy}, mzdp = #{mzdp}, hyzk = #{hyzk}, xx = #{xx}, sg = #{sg}, tz = #{tz}, zp = #{zp}, jkzk = #{jkzk}, cjgzsj = #{cjgzsj}, cjsj = #{cjsj}, bzlx = #{bzlx}, gwlx = #{gwlx}, zw = #{zw}, zc = #{zc}, gwdj = #{gwdj}, yjsds = #{yjsds}, zyzg = #{zyzg}, zyzgsj = #{zyzgsj}, ryzt = #{ryzt}, zgxlxw = #{zgxlxw}, dyxlxw = #{dyxlxw}, zgxlxx = #{zgxlxx}, dyxlxx = #{dyxlxx}, zgxlrxsj = #{zgxlrxsj}, zgxlbysj = #{zgxlbysj}, dyxlrxsj = #{dyxlrxsj}, dyxlbysj = #{dyxlbysj}, sxzy = #{sxzy}, dyzy = #{dyzy}, xueke = #{xueke}, dy211 = #{dy211}, zg211 = #{zg211}, dywy = #{dywy}, wyslcd = #{wyslcd}, pthsp = #{pthsp}, bgdh = #{bgdh}, sj = #{sj}, qq = #{qq}, yx = #{yx}, bgdz = #{bgdz}, jtzz = #{jtzz}, txdz = #{txdz}, youbian = #{youbian}, rsdadw = #{rsdadw}, rsdabh = #{rsdabh}, tc = #{tc}, jianli = #{jianli}, chengji = #{chengji}, bishi = #{bishi}, mianshi = #{mianshi}, khzf = #{khzf}, yxbz = #{yxbz}, xcqrbz = #{xcqrbz}, zgsc = #{zgsc}, dqsxren = #{dqsxren}, dqsxrenid = #{dqsxrenid}, dqsxzt = #{dqsxzt}, zzsxzt = #{zzsxzt}, saixuanyj = #{saixuanyj}, niluyong = #{niluyong}, shenpi = #{shenpi}, spren = #{spren}, sprenid = #{sprenid}, ruzhi = #{ruzhi}, beizhu = #{beizhu}, zyyq = #{zyyq}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, zpjlid, fjmc, fjlj FROM zpjlxqfj a where a.zpjlid=#{zpjlid}
